name: EMPEROR
description:
A 2-player 2D shooter where you can control your bullets

CONTROLS:

  (In setup)
Player 1 selects color with A and D
Player 2 selects color with J and L

  (In game)
Player 1:
A and D to move
W to jump
Q or E to fire
WASD to control bullet

Player 2:
J and L to move
I to jump
U or O to fire
IJKL to control bullet
